occupation: Freelancer | Mobile & Full-Stack Engineer | AWS Architect at Freiberuflich
headline: Freelancer | Mobile App & Full-Stack Developer | AWS & Cloud Enthusiast #JustDuIt

experiences.title: Freelancer | Mobile & Full-Stack Engineer | AWS Architect
experiences.description:
As a passionate Full-Stack Developer & Software Architect, I support companies in building modern, scalable digital solutions ‚Äî from native mobile apps to cloud-based SaaS platforms and AI-powered applications.

With a strong focus on Mobile Development (iOS, Android, Flutter), Backend & Cloud (AWS, Node.js, Golang), Web Technologies (React, Next.js), and Generative AI (LLMs, Agents), I deliver end-to-end solutions tailored to business needs.

I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, driving projects from concept to production, and ensuring clean architecture, high code quality, and an excellent user experience.

üöÄ Latest Projects

Mobile Flutter Developer | Sensor Calibration App
Feb 2025 ‚Äì Apr 2025
Developed a Flutter-based mobile app for sensor evaluation and calibration via Bluetooth LE. Focused on modern UI/UX design, seamless BLE integration, and performance optimization to ensure long-term maintainability and scalability.
Tech: Flutter, Bluetooth LE, Clean Architecture, UI/UX Design

Software Architect & Engineer | Financial Analytics SaaS Platform
Nov 2024 ‚Äì Jan 2025
Designed and built a cloud-native financial analysis platform focused on harmonic pattern detection and trading strategies for stocks, forex, and crypto assets. Delivered a scalable SaaS solution leveraging modern cloud infrastructure.
Tech: AWS, Golang, PostgreSQL, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Auth0, Stripe

iOS App Engineer | Smart Home Control System (Albrecht Jung GmbH & Co. KG)
May 2023 ‚Äì Jan 2025
Led the development of a next-gen Smart Home app using Bluetooth Mesh for seamless IoT device communication. Delivered an intuitive setup and control experience, integrating Firebase for real-time sync and remote management.
Tech: Swift, SwiftUI, Kotlin, BLE, Bluetooth Mesh, Firebase, Tuist, GitLab, Scrum

experiences.title: CTO & Lead Software Architect
experiences.description:
As CTO at AeroSys, I was responsible for the technical development and architecture of an AI-powered co-pilot system designed for aviation. The core product involved developing hardware for Conversational AI in the cockpit, complemented by a Flutter-based Companion App for pilots. My focus was on ensuring robust system architecture, high-quality software development, and seamless AI integration while driving best practices in Quality Assurance, CI/CD, and strategic technology planning.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Architected and developed the AI-powered cockpit system, integrating Conversational AI and real-time data processing
‚Ä¢	Designed and implemented the Companion App using Flutter, enabling pilots to interact with the system seamlessly
‚Ä¢	Ensured high software quality through automated testing, code reviews, and Quality Gates
‚Ä¢	Established CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments and integration testing
‚Ä¢	Defined and executed the technology roadmap, focusing on scalability, maintainability, and security
‚Ä¢	Developed real-time communication protocols between the cockpit system and the Companion App
‚Ä¢	Implemented edge computing strategies to process AI-driven interactions efficiently

experiences.title: CTO & Co-Founder, Lead Software Architect
experiences.description:
At KickOn, our vision was to build a comprehensive platform for the hospitality industry, covering everything from user engagement and payments to web presence and integration with POS (Point-of-Sale) and inventory management systems. As CTO and co-founder, I was responsible for the technical concept and implementation, ensuring a scalable and efficient architecture.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Designed and implemented the platform architecture, ensuring scalability and reliability
‚Ä¢	Developed the web application using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, providing a seamless experience for businesses and customers
‚Ä¢	Built a Flutter-based mobile app for real-time interactions and user engagement
‚Ä¢	Developed the backend with Node.js and TypeScript, ensuring secure and fast data processing
‚Ä¢	Integrated AWS services for hosting, authentication, and cloud infrastructure
‚Ä¢	Established best practices for development, including CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and security guidelines

experiences.title: Software Engineer (Mobile Apps)
experiences.description:
As a Software Engineer at slashwhy (formerly SALT AND PEPPER Software GmbH & Co. KG), I worked on developing mobile applications for iOS and Android, as well as backend solutions. I focused on Flutter, Swift, Kotlin, Xamarin, delivering scalable and user-friendly applications.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Developed iOS and Android apps using Swift, Kotlin & Flutter
‚Ä¢	Worked on IoT and AgTech and Consumer-Electronics projects, building software for connected devices
‚Ä¢	Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers to enhance user experience

experiences.title: Head of Mobile Application Development & Software Enginneer for Mobile Apps
experiences.description:
As Head of Mobile Application Development at LMIS, I led a team developing mobile applications for various industries and clients, delivering tailored solutions across enterprise, consumer, and industrial sectors. While managing the team, I was also actively involved in software development, working on both native (iOS & Android) and cross-platform (Flutter) applications.


Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Developed and led mobile projects for clients across multiple industries, including logistics, healthcare, and automotive
‚Ä¢	Built native iOS apps with Swift and Objective-C, and Android apps with Kotlin and Java
‚Ä¢	Designed and implemented cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter
‚Ä¢	Ensured high performance and scalability by implementing best practices in mobile development
‚Ä¢	Worked closely with clients, designers, and backend teams to deliver user-centric applications
‚Ä¢	Established CI/CD pipelines for mobile development, improving deployment and update processes
‚Ä¢	Defined mobile technology strategies, helping clients choose the best approach for their applications

experiences.title: Software Engineer & Consultant
experiences.description:
- Initially focused on Java EE development and maintenance
- Later specialized in mobile app development for iOS (Objective-C, Swift) and Android (Java)
- Designed and implemented custom mobile solutions for various clients and industries
- Provided consulting and technical guidance on mobile strategies and architectures
- Collaborated closely with design and product teams to develop user-friendly and high-performance applications
- Optimized existing apps for performance, UX, and code quality
- Acted as a consultant in external teams to help build and scale their mobile applications
